entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
